author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DALILA CONTINUES TO BRING STRONG WINDS AND HEAVY RAIN TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...DALILA CONTINUES TO BRING STRONG WINDS AND HEAVY RAIN TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 03:00 UTC SUN JUN 15 2025 the center of Dalila was located near 17.6, -106.1 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 993 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Dalila (EP4/EP042025)
